about_the_game:
We are currently undergoing a transition from 2D to 3D. New screenshots and footage will be added to this page as they become available.
Thank you for your patience and support during this exciting time!

Adventure

Discover 'Takara Island', where vibrant characters, charming locales, and hilarious hijinks await.

Action

Brave atmospheric Vaults filled with traps, puzzles, lore, and formidable foes, ranging from Revenants of all shapes and sizes to rival Hunters and pirates!

Collect & Craft

Team up with your best friend, Key, to craft and collect powerful new forms and modifiers for the Giga Gun, including the Giga Gatling, Giga Grenadier, and more!

Mini Games

Let's just say there will be more than you could kick a can at...
detailed_description:
We are currently undergoing a transition from 2D to 3D. New screenshots and footage will be added to this page as they become available.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.10 or higher
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260, ATI Radeon 4870 HD, card with at least 512 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Lock & Key: A Hunter's Legacy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Become an unlikely hero by exploring, building new gadgets, jumping, and shooting to delve into a mysterious tower that has emerged from the ground without warning and awakened a terrible power...
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
